Los afroamericanos viven con el miedo constante de que una interacción ordinaria con la policía los puede llevar a la muerte.

1267195146510241792.text:
Arrestados por su color de piel, sin beneficio de la duda y asesinados.

Laquan McDonald, Tamir Rice, Oscar Grant, Rekia Boyd, Eric Garner, Michael Brown, Sandra Bland, Philando Castile, Breonna Taylor y George Floyd.

1267193208368439297.text:
LAS VIDAS DE LOS AFROAMERICANOS IMPORTAN

1267188596454367232.text:
Silence​ is ​not an option​.

Silence​ kills​. 

#BlackLivesMatters

1267188450442215424.text:
All of us have the ​responsibility to call out racism​ and take action.

1267188238034309120.text: The unfortunately reality is that ​racism​ has been operating in our families, communities, and government institutions for far too long disguised through sanctioned policies and backhanded compliments​.

1267187944194019328.text:
BLACK LIVES MATTER

It​ is more than just a statement; it is a movement ​that compels us to ​value black​ lives as much as you value your life​, your parent’s life, or your children’s life.

1267187517478092800.text:

1267186269181935617.text:

Four hundred years of intergenerational trauma and countless innocent lives lost to slavery, lynching, Jim Crow, police brutality, and murder in broad day light.

1263632782015766531.text: The #HEROESAct provides badly needed relief for the communities I represent— for workers, renters, immigrants & the unemployed. But it’s still not enough and we must do more. #BeBoldTownHall

1263632311825756160.text: I was elected to Congress to fight for my community, and to make sure their needs are met. At every step I’ve used my voice & vote to make that happen. That includes standing up for immigrants, working-class people & traditionally marginalized communities.

1263631878189449216.text:
Today I joined @peopleslobbyusa @ONENorthside @SeniorCaucus @janschakowsky and other organizations, activists & elected officials to call for a people’s bailout!

#BeBoldTownHall

1263587485570830338.text: It’s un-American and inhumane to intentionally restrict access during a time of desperate need. Let’s not forget that this country runs on immigrants.

1263586955503136769.text: Before my vote on the #HEROESAct, community members and organizations shared with me many stories of their families struggling during this pandemic on top of so much uncertainty due to lack of federal, state, and local support.

1263586402710597637.text: The purpose of this initiative is to call the state government to promptly address the barriers Latinos are currently facing due to flaws in data collection, education, outreach, and services available to the community.

1263585916330799111.text: I recently joined a group of other Latino elected officials from Chicago City Council, Cook County Board of Commissioners & the Illinois legislature together w/ health experts and community organizations to launch the Illinois Latino COVID-19 Initiative.

1263584722841563138.text: I voted for the #HEROESAct because it does what the CARES Act and previous relief bills did not: it includes immigrants and it addresses some of the key systematic disparities causing pain for the working families I represent.

1263583912648826881.text: At @icirr’s #EverybodyIn town hall, I firmly committed to fighting for all the elements in the Everybody In platform, which includes making cash assistance, testing and treatment available to everyone, regardless of immigration status.

1263267850640334849.text:
The first Latino president in @SierraClub’s 128-year history! 

@RamonCruzDiaz, ¡muchas felicidades por tu nuevo rol en esta organización! Sabemos que traerás un liderazgo más inclusivo y llevarás la lucha de Sierra Club por la equidad y justicia ambiental al siguiente nivel.

1263178352531320837.text: We can’t let the financial sector write its own rules anymore, and we have to stand up against BlackRock’s power in the markets and in politics.

1263178084125114369.text: This bill also creates a climate change subcommittee of the Financial Stability Oversight Council so that regulators can track the risks that climate change poses to our financial system.

1263177679844540417.text: This spring, I introduced the Systemic Risk Mitigation Act, which would automatically designate huge, interconnected financial firms like BlackRock as systematically important and ensure they are regulated more strongly.

1263176727804641285.text: If BlackRock is in charge of shaping our economy after the COVID-19 crisis, will it work for the fossil fuel companies that it’s invested in, or will it work with us to take on climate risk and build a new economy for all?

1263174834667900928.text:
BlackRock is a major investor in fossil fuels, and Trump already said he wants to bail out the fossil fuel industry.

I am in Congress to hold big corporations accountable.

1263173031670820865.text: BlackRock is becoming more than a shadow bank— it is becoming a shadow government. #ThePeoplesAssembly

1263172596285222914.text: BlackRock is the world’s largest asset manager and does contract-consulting for governments around the world. The Federal Reserve hired the company to run its bond market programs, and the EU hired them to advise banking regulators on climate risk.

1263165734852714496.text: Instead of helping working people and the most vulnerable in our society, our government has gone above and beyond for the financial markets— and BlackRock is at the center of that.

1263165295780339714.text: My constituents and neighbors are suffering. Despite the efforts of many of my progressive colleagues and myself, the CARES Act didn’t go far enough and many of its benefits do not apply to undocumented and mixed-status families.

1263123605212336128.text:

581286617773686784.text: The red-light cameras pick peoples pockets & Chicagoans have caught on. Cameras will end on my 1st day as Mayor. #fox32debate #Chuy2015

581284721948233728.text: I'll make sure FAA takes action on intolerable jet noise. The Mayor has the authority & obligation to act, not wait for FAA. #fox32debate

581283203262058496.text: People will cooperate with police officers if we establish a policy of true community policing. LA has shown this is true. #fox32debate

581281775256776704.text: This Mayor's budgets are balanced on the backs of regular Chicagoans through regressive fees, fines, & penalties. #fox32debate

581281301015166976.text: Under this Mayor, the city is in financial free fall. That's why ratings agencies have given him an F as a fiscal steward. #fox32debate

581280383871893504.text: Closing of mental health clinics another example of bad choices by a Mayor who doesn't understand the impact of his policies. #fox32debate

581279671620374528.text: The Mayor is not rooted in the day to day life of Chicago's neighborhoods. That's all I know. #fox32debate #Chuy2015

581279324969525248.text: The neighborhoods organized to close those coal plants for 20 years. The Mayor just cut the ribbon & took the credit. #fox32debate #Chuy2015

581278431582748672.text: We can't continue to live in a Chicago that is a tale of two cities. The neighborhoods have been starved over past 4 years. #fox32debate

581277972377784320.text: The Mayor should not make decisions by fiat, he should listen to people. He is not king of the city. #fox32debate #Chuy2015

581276978608807936.text: I don't disagree with a longer school day. I disagree with the Mayor's failure to fund that longer day. #fox32debate #Chuy2015

581275525190156288.text: Mayor's appointed school board lacks transparency, riddled with conflicts of interest. #fox32debate #Chuy2015
